title: Honeymoon of Deception
description: The soon to be married Mellisa Banks is a telecommunications specialist with a major telecom company. Her fianc√© Mike Stamaoplous is handsome young yoga instructor at a health spa. The young couple look forward to their exotic honeymoon to Acapulco , that is until the unthinkable happens and Mellisa finds herself amid a web of lies, deception and hidden truths.
author: J.L.   Morris
